title: The Special….
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Lan la-la-lan~♪ Let’s eat the special chocolate as a reward for working hard on practice~.... Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eh, that was your chocolate, Kotori!? I thought it was a μ’s shared sweet…. I’m sorry!! Cocoa and the others were just here, so I let them eat it to get them to behave<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I-, I see. Did they…. behave after that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>It worked like a charm. They were all sitting upright and munching away….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>T-, that’s good to hear….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Kotori…. You were looking forward to that chocolate, weren’t you? I’m truly sorry!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>No, it’s fine, it’s fine. Don’t mind it, Nico-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>As an apology, I’ll go bake you cupcakes with lots of chocolate chips in them tomorrow. This Nico will be making them, so they’ll be extremely delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Eeh!? Really!? I’m so happy! I lo~ve your cupcakes, Nico-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Leave it to Nico! I’ll make you more than you can eat!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
